message: My response: "Our site does not host copyrighted content and has neither cloned your site. Your site is simply displayed in an iframe, which you can avoid with iframe busters. Nevertheless I complied to your ridiculous request and removed the pivot."

Here's a funny request by one of the guys behind tiger.co.uk: "Your site has cloned the copyrighted content of our site, can you please remove this from your website as this will affect our own site due to your site cloning the content"
Sounds like the site is run by my mom.
lol. stupid is as stupid does.
How legal is the proxying anyway? Is it considered fair use?
